description: Erection of a single storey rear extension and a rear staircase.
decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Condition : 2 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

Condition : 3 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (Unnumbered Location Plan, received on 22/03/2017;
1729/PL/01 and Unnumbered Proposed Block Plan, received on 03/07/2019) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 4 - No servicing of the premises shall take place other than from the rear service / access road and the bins are to be kept in the designated area at the rear of the site and are only to be brought out for collection and returned immediately after.

Condition : 5 - Prior to first use of the hereby approved development, a continuous handrail shall be provided on both sides of the stairs and on the landing area. The handrails shall thereafter be retained as such.

Condition : 6 - Prior to first use, a scheme for lighting the stairs shall be submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority. The lighting shall be static and not face on to the highway.  The details as approved shall be implemented in full prior to first use of the development and shall thereafter be retained as such.
